mapper.insert: insert into artist(user_no, artist_name, bank_name, bank_account, bank_owner, email, artist_phone, fan_main_img, reg_date, fan_explain, artist_private, hashtag, artist_profile_img) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{artist_name}, #{bank_name}, #{bank_account}, #{bank_owner}, #{email}, #{artist_phone}, #{fan_main_img}, now(), #{fan_explain}, #{artist_private}, #{hashtag}, #{artist_profile_img})
mapper.update: update artist SET artist_name=#{artist_name}, bank_name=#{bank_name}, bank_account=#{bank_account}, bank_owner=#{bank_owner}, email=#{email}, artist_phone=#{artist_phone}, fan_main_img=#{fan_main_img}, fan_explain=#{fan_explain}, artist_private=#{artist_private}, hashtag=#{hashtag}, artist_profile_img=#{artist_profile_img}, fan_number=#{fan_number}, fan_visit_today=#{fan_visit_today} WHERE artist_no=#{artist_no}
mapper.select: select * from artist order by fan_number desc limit 10
select * from artist order by reg_date desc limit 10
select * from artist where artist_name like #{search} or hashtag like #{search}
select * from artist where artist_name like #{search} or hashtag like #{search} LIMIT 15
